Holiday Gala is an opening reception event for four November-December exhibitions at the Bush Barn Art Center. Enjoy Mediterranean inspired foods and live music while perusing handmade gifts, functional crafts, artisan jewelry and fine art. Advance tickets (before Oct 25): $10 members, $20 non-members; regular tickets (after Oct 25): $15 members, $25 non-members.

title: Exhibit: James Southworth ~ Colors of Istanbul and Greece
body:
Inspired by a trip to Istanbul and the Greek Islands, James Southworth's vibrant pastel paintings bring to life the sunshine of the Eastern Mediterranean and transport us to the sunlit hill towns of the Aegean. Gallery Hours: Tue.-Fri. 10 a.m.-5 p.m.; Sat.-Sun. noon-5 p.m. Closed Mondays.
